title: Factors to increase rate of rxn - C2H4 and H2

content.question: C2H4(g) is reduced by H2(g) in the presence of a solid platinum catalyst, as represented by the equation above. Factors that could affect the rate of the reaction include which of the following? Changes in the partial pressure of H2(g) Changes in the particle size of the platinum catalyst Changes in the temperature of the reaction system

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
